snippet: Feeding the gains in October was a 1.8 percent increase in spending on single-family houses.
abstract: Commerce Department reports that construction spending rose 1.1 percent in October, following 0.1 slip in September; is highest rate of increase since May.
lead_paragraph: Feeding the gains in October was a 1.8 percent increase in spending on single-family houses.

headline.main: Construction Spending Surged in October After Earlier Fall
headline.print_headline: Construction Spending Surged in October After Earlier Fall
